ModMetaData.name: Ultimate Gear
ModMetaData.author: Rademenes16
ModMetaData.description:
Welcome to Ultimate Gear mod! Feel the most unfair and game breaking experience.

Call this mod as you like - cheat, life changer, just a test... I don't care, you name it.
